description: A collection of preflight profile rules.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Adds a new preflight rule to the profile.

parameters.description: The ID of the rule to be added
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new PreflightProfileRule (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the PreflightProfileRule.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRules within the specified range.

parameters.description: The PreflightProfileRule, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PreflightProfileRule, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The PreflightProfileRule, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PreflightProfileRule, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first PreflightProfileRule in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last PreflightProfileRule in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle PreflightProfileRule in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the PreflightProfileRule that follows the desired PreflightProfileRule.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule whose index follows the specified PreflightProfileRule in the collection.

parameters.description: The PreflightProfileRule whose index comes before the desired PreflightProfileRule.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any PreflightProfileRule in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every PreflightProfileRule in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PreflightProfileRule.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the PreflightProfileRule with the specified index.

name: PreflightProfileRules
